short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Know about the Levi Ackerman Haircut

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Levi Ackerman is one of the most important characters in the  Attack on Titan series. His skill on unsheathing steel becomes his traits, added with high acceleration upon unleashing his attacks. Aside from his fighting prowess and bravery, Levi is also adored by many anime fans due to his appearance.
